name: Zombie Escape (korben)
description:
After learning Pygame from KidsCanCode, I decided to take the tile-based game a bit further into more of an actual game.

This is a preview. I have more levels planned so if you want me to make more, let me know in the comments below :)

Reminiscient of older flash games from the mid 2000's.

The game was developed on Mac. I tested the Windows version briefly so let me know of any bugs.
Link to code on GitHub: https://github.com/benjamin-korobkin/Tile-shooter
